name: Companions - A Platforming Game
description:
Gameplay Instructions:

  • Use your Arrow keys to move .
  • Use up Up Arrow key to jump.
  • Use Space Bar to attack.
  • Use Space Bar to go through dialogue
  • Use Q to equip companions
  • Use the following for Overworld Map: 
    • Village - V key 
    • Level 1 - Rocky Pass - R key
    •  Level 2 - Abandoned Caverns - A key 
    • Level 3 - Slime Valley - S key
  • Collect coins to spend and hearts to heal.
  • Don't get hit by the enemy slimes!

Note: If anything bugs out, you can reset back to the village with the H key.

If you would like to view the code, you can go to https://github.com/Randy-Hodges/Companions

If you enjoy the game and/or want to see the game developed further, feel free to leave a comment.
